categories.name: Scaling + Stage Fit
categories.criteria: Repeatedly led scaling through high-growth phases; 'hire faster + raise bar' tradeoffs with proof. Owned meaningful scale (team growth, hiring acceleration) with clear levers and outcomes.
sample_questions: Tell me about the fastest growth phase you've been part of in a venture-backed company. What was your direct ownership in accelerating hiring/headcount during that period?
Walk me through how you balanced "hire faster" vs "raise the bar" when scaling TA teams from ~10 to 50+ headcount. What trade-offs did you make, and what were the measurable outcomes?
Give an example of a time you had to dramatically accelerate hiring velocity while keeping quality high. What levers did you pull?

categories.name: Enterprise SaaS Hiring
categories.criteria: Deep enterprise SaaS hiring including senior/exec roles; strong calibration for 'enterprise operators'. Solid hiring across GTM + Product/Eng.
sample_questions: Describe your experience hiring for enterprise SaaS companies — specifically across GTM (Sales, CS, Marketing) and Product/Engineering. How do you calibrate for "enterprise operator" profiles?
Tell me about hiring senior or executive roles in enterprise SaaS (Director/VP/C-level). What signals do you look for to know someone can operate at scale in complex GTM + tech environments?
How have you built hiring processes that work consistently for both go-to-market and technical roles in enterprise settings?

categories.name: Conversational AI / Agentic AI (or AI-forward) Hiring
categories.criteria: Direct conversational/agentic AI company experience OR strong AI market fluency + demonstrated wins closing top AI talent.
sample_questions: Have you hired AI/ML, conversational AI, or agentic AI talent before? Walk me through one tough AI-related hire you closed — what made it hard, and how did you win them?
How fluent are you in the current AI talent market (LLMs, agentic systems, applied AI)? Give examples of roles you've filled or candidates you've assessed in this space.
What strategies have you used to attract and close top-tier AI researchers or engineers when competing with OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.?

categories.name: Role Stability
categories.criteria: Consistent long stints (2–3+ years) and clear progression. Mostly 2+ years per role.
sample_questions: Walk me through your last 3–4 roles. For each, how long were you there, what was your impact, and why did you leave?
Tell me about a time you stayed in a TA leadership role for 2+ years. What did you build or improve over that longer horizon?
